item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 5, 2025 at 3:20 PM UTC
item.description:

8. NASA Successfully Acquires GPS Signals on Moon (114 points | 58 comments)

28. Why “alias” is my last resort for aliases (42 points | 48 comments)
29. DARPA exploring growing bio structures of "unprecedented size" in microgravity (165 points | 77 comments)
